item.title: Call to Action: Migrate Your Classic Alert‑trigger Automations to Automation Rules Before March 2026
item.description:
Reminder: Following the Retirement Announcement published in March 2023, classic alert‑trigger automation in Microsoft Sentinel, where playbooks are triggered directly from analytic rules will be deprecated in March 2026. To ensure your alert‑driven automations continue to run without interruption, please migrate to automation rules. How to Identify the Impacted Rules To help you quickly identify if any analytic rules should be updated, we created a Logic App solution that identifies all the analytic rules which use classic automation.
